Here is a small test application https://github.com/nickytd/websocket-echo-client I use to verify WS and WSS handling in websocket implementation. The case is simple: open #number(100 is default) of connections send 1000 short text messages close the session. The HTTP case is running just fine, however the SSL case is problematic. After 2 runs with 100 connections the SSL is unresponsive. The WS case is operational though. I'll look further into this and you're welcome to take a look and comment as well.

Current Tomcat 8 revision under test is
Repository Root: http://svn.apache.org/repos/asf
Revision: 1502433
